channel.title: Buy hosting?
channel.description: Hmm this is a stupid question but : Is it possible too buy a hosting thing so i give some money and then i can join my server so i dont have too do that portforward?

item.title: Buy hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickdds Patrickdds
item.description:
@Patrickdds wrote:

[quote=“48 Jumps, post:4, topic:278944”]I bought a Dedicated from vpsland and didn’t have to portforward. You WILL need to take off alot of restrictions preventing you from downloading stuff. You also will probably need to download Winrar, JDK, JRE, and more. If you don’t know how to portforward you PROBABLY won’t know how to setup your VPS or dedicated.

The difference between VPS and dedicated is:

Dedicated is yours and only yours and costs more.
VPS is virtual private server and is shared by multiple people.[/quote]
I have Winrar, JDK but not JRE if i buy dedicated can i use my no-ip ore do i get something like 5.150.442.**** as ip address

Read full topic

item.title: Buy hosting?
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

I bought a Dedicated from vpsland and didn’t have to portforward. You WILL need to take off alot of restrictions preventing you from downloading stuff. You also will probably need to download Winrar, JDK, JRE, and more. If you don’t know how to portforward you PROBABLY won’t know how to setup your VPS or dedicated.

The difference between VPS and dedicated is:

Dedicated is yours and only yours and costs more.
VPS is virtual private server and is shared by multiple people.

Read full topic

item.title: Buy hosting?
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

You want to pay someone else to host your server so you can get on it? It’s possible… I kinda feel bad. Ok try to follow a tutorial on portforwarding and if you need help pm me. I’ve never portforwarded before but my maxhit method is about to drive me crazy (If anyone knows the formula of how to set up the math floor for attack bonuses pm me).

Read full topic
